abstract_summ: Astroviruses have been identified in the stools of calves with enteritis and in the brain tissues of bovines with encephalitis but their pathogenic role has not been clarified . Bovine torovirus (BToV) is a diarrhea-causing pathogen . In this study, 92 diarrheic fecal samples from five farms in four provinces in China were collected and tested for BToV .
